Hey guys does anyone here knows how Espresso Test Recorder / Robotium  internally works ? 

I tried using Espresso and Robotium and even Xamarin Test Recorder. I wanted to know how do these tools work internally. How do they get to know what view I interacted with and what was the interaction(touch, swipe tap etc)
Just like how regular app knows what you do

<@U0DR9EZGW> Test Recorder runs your app in debug mode, setting breakpoints in framework code at places like View#onClickâ€¦ when the breakpoints are hit, it extracts some metadata to build out the espresso scenarios
(which is why your app will be a bit slower than usual when recording tests)
